body_html: This is still an issue. @gunan agreed we can take a look. I also find this frustrating. Unless you are doing different version locally it is easier to say nothing and it will compile from the default folders. If you have multiple versions you will want to point to the correct folder.
body_text: This is still an issue.  @gunan  agreed we can take a look.  I also find this frustrating.  Unless you are doing different version locally it is easier to say nothing and it will compile from the default folders.  If you have multiple versions you will want to point to the correct folder.
body: This is still an issue.  @gunan  agreed we can take a look.  I also find this frustrating.  Unless you are doing different version locally it is easier to say nothing and it will compile from the default folders.  If you have multiple versions you will want to point to the correct folder.
